type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Fog

---

Changes the fog color of the entity.

---

### Example
```json
{
  "type": "moborigins:fog",
  "red": 1,
  "green": 1,
  "blue": 1,
  "start": -1,
  "end": 30,
  "condition": {
    "type": "apoli:sneaking",
    "inverted": true
  }
}
```
This makes it so the player has a thick white fog, which can be disabled by sneaking.

This looks like:

![Fog Image](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/power_types/fog)

## Fog

---

Changes the fog color of the entity.

{
  "type": "moborigins:fog",
  "red": 1,
  "green": 1,

This makes it so the player has a thick white fog, which can be disabled by sneaking.

![Fog Image](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/power_types/fog)

red.description: The red value of the fog color.

green.description: The green value of the fog color.

blue.description: The blue value of the fog color.
blue.markdownDescription: The blue value of the fog color.

start.description: The start distance of the fog.
start.markdownDescription: The start distance of the fog.

end.description: The end distance of the fog.
end.markdownDescription: The end distance of the fog.
